plot: Bronies Donald "DustyKatt" Rhoades and Daniel "Screwball" Collins interview bronies, My Little Pony staff and cover other news in the entertainment world.
plot_en: Bronies Donald "DustyKatt" Rhoades and Daniel "Screwball" Collins interview bronies, My Little Pony staff and cover other news in the entertainment world.

title: Stay Brony My Friends
